arts.ttl: Rangers predicted XI vs Club Brugge — Forward returns in four changes, first-team regulars axed
arts.sum: Rangers have a mammoth task against Club Brugge in the Champions League on Wednesday. Rangers will travel to the Jan Breydel Stadium on 27 August... The post Rangers predicted XI vs Club Brugge — Forward returns in four changes, first-team regulars axed appeared first on Ibrox News.
